pullRequest.body:
We split `Algebra.Order.Nonneg.Ring` into `Algebra.Order.Ring.Unbundled.Nonneg` which uses unbundled ordered algebra typeclasses, eg `CovariantClass`, and `Algebra.Order.Nonneg.Ring` which uses bundled class, eg `OrderedAddComm`. Using this we can avoid importing bundled ordered algebra classes until later downstream.

---
